subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
Human Rights and Democracy Network http://www.hrdn.eu/ 
Front Line Defenders has Special Consultative Status with the Economic and Social Council of the United Nations https://www.un.org/ecosoc/en/home 
Front Line Defenders is also a member of the Women Human Rights Defenders International Coalition http://www.defendingwomen-defendingrights.org/, ESCRNet – the International Network for Economic, Social & Cultural Rights https://www.escr-net.org/, and the International Human Rights Funders Group https://www.ihrfg.org/, and is an Associate Member of Dóchas – The Irish Association of Non-Governmental Development Organisations http://www.dochas.ie/ 
Lifeline - Embattled CSOs Assistance Fund 
Journalists in Distress Network 
https://www.frontlinedefenders.org/en/who-we-are.
